name: BuiltInParameterTransformerTest
description: Unit tests for the BuiltInParameterTransformer class, focusing on its transformation capabilities and limitations.

nested_classes.name: TestEnum
nested_classes.description: Internal enum class used for testing.

test_cases.name: simple_object_mapper_only_supports_class_types
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer throws an exception when trying to transform a string to an unsupported generic type.

test_cases.name: simple_object_mapper_only_supports_some_class_types
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer throws an exception when trying to transform a string to an unsupported class type.

test_cases.name: simple_object_mapper_only_supports_some_optional_types
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer throws an exception when trying to transform a string to an unsupported Optional type.

test_cases.name: simple_object_mapper_only_supports_some_generic_types
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer throws an exception when trying to transform a string to an unsupported generic type.

test_cases.name: should_throw_exception_for_unknown_enum_values
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer throws an exception when trying to transform a string to an unknown enum value.

test_cases.name: should_transform_boolean
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer can transform various string representations of boolean values to Boolean objects.

test_cases.name: should_transform_char
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer can transform single-character strings to Character objects.

test_cases.name: should_throw_exception_for_empty_string_with_type_char
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer throws an exception when trying to transform an empty string to a Character object.

test_cases.name: should_throw_exception_for_nonsingelchar_string_with_type_char
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer throws an exception when trying to transform a multi-character string to a Character object.

test_cases.name: should_transform_optional
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer can transform strings to Optional objects.

test_cases.name: should_transform_optional_generic_string
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer can transform strings to Optional<String> objects.

test_cases.name: should_transform_optional_generic_integer
test_cases.description: Tests that the BuiltInParameterTransformer can transform strings to Optional<Integer> objects.
